org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class EventApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.EventApi

public class EventApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Event API.

This class provides access to the events within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

Method Detail

findEvents

public EventsResponse findEvents(Resource r,
                                 long begin,
                                 long end)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Find Events for a Resource.

Parameters:
r - The Resource to search for events
begin - The beginning of the time window in epoch-millis.
end - The end of the time window in epoch-millis.
Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, a list of Events are returned via EventsResponse.getEvent().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

findEvents

public EventsResponse findEvents(long begin,
                                 long end,
                                 EventApi.EventType type,
                                 EventApi.EventStatus status,
                                 int count)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Find Events in HQ.

Parameters:
begin - The beginning of the time window in epoch-millis.
end - The end of the time window in epoch-millis.
type - The type of event to search for, or null for all types.
status - The maximum status to include in the search results.
count - The maximum number of Events to return.
Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, a list of Events are returned via EventsResponse.getEvent().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
